CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We recognize that both J sc and FF of PIDT-C12NT based device were much higher than those of obtained based on the other two polymers , which could be ascribed to optimal morphology with appropriate domain size of the photoactive layer and superior charge carrier mobility that can promote the exciton separation and charge transporting , and consequently lead to simultaneously increased J sc and FF.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PIDT-C12NT |
| J sc |
| FF |

Note:

* PIDT-C12NT is a polymer material.
* J sc and FF are not materials, but rather properties or characteristics of the material.

Therefore, the only material name in the given paragraph is PIDT-C12NT.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: We recognize that both J sc and FF of PIDT-C12NT based device were much higher than those of obtained based on the other two polymers , which could be ascribed to optimal morphology with appropriate domain size of the photoactive layer and superior charge carrier mobility that can promote the exciton separation and charge transporting , and consequently lead to simultaneously increased J sc and FF.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| J sc | Photocurrent density |
| FF | Fill factor |
| PIDT-C12NT | Polymer |
| domain size | Morphology |
| charge carrier mobility | Charge transporting ability |
| exciton separation | Efficiency of charge separation |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value | Description |
| --- | --- |
| J sc | Photocurrent density |
| FF | Fill factor |
| domain size | Morphology |
| charge carrier mobility | Charge transporting ability |

The following entities do not clearly refer to "Value of material property":

* PIDT-C12NT (polymer)
* exciton separation (efficiency of charge separation)

These entities are not directly related to the value of a material property, but rather to the performance of a device or system.
